oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Neurological Diseases of Sheep and Goats
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Navarre, Christine B.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: neurological disease
goats
listeriosis
polioencephalomalacia
history
physical examination
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper discusses the most common neurological diseases in sheep and goats, including listeriosis and polioencephalomalacia. Because diagnostic techniques may be limited, a thorough history and complete physical examination are imperative. Tips for taking a history, performing a physical exam and some diagnostic techniques are presented. Treatment options are also presented where applicable.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2007; 180-182
